RelatedSentence: Manama , May19 ( BNA ) Minister of State for Defence Affairs Lieutenant - General Dr. Shaikh Mohammed bin Abdulla Al - Khalifa today received Kuwaiti Military Judicial Authority President Major General Abdulwahab Al - Salahi , who is leading a delegation on his visit to Bahrain .

Manama , May19 ( BNA ) Minister of State for Defence Affairs Lieutenant - General Dr. Shaikh Mohammed bin Abdulla Al - Khalifa today received Kuwaiti Military Judicial Authority President Major General Abdulwahab Al - Salahi , who is leading a delegation on his visit to Bahrain .

A0: Minister of State for Defence Affairs Lieutenant-General Dr. Shaikh Mohammed bin Abdulla Al-Khalifa today
RelatedSentence: The minister welcomed Major - General Al - Salahi , hailing strong bilateral relations bonding the Kingdom of Bahrain and the State of Kuwait .

A0: Minister of State for Defence Affairs Lieutenant-General Dr. Shaikh Mohammed bin Abdulla Al-Khalifa today
RelatedSentence: He paid tribute to the leaders of the two countries for bolstering joint cooperation , including military relations .

The two sides discussed joint cooperation in the session which was attended by Military Judicial director and Head of the Military Court of Cassation Brigadier Yusuf Rashid Fulaifal , Kuwait Embassy Military Attaché Brigadier Ali Suleiman Al - Asaker and other senior BDF officers .
